meanings.definition: A type of dental floss used for cleaning between teeth.
meanings.sent1: I always use flossie after brushing my teeth.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended using flossie daily for oral hygiene.
meanings.sent3: When I ran out of flossie, I had to use a toothpick instead.
meanings.sent4: Her smile sparkled like she had just used flossie between each tooth.
meanings.sent5: The thin flossie easily slid between my teeth, removing food particles.

meanings.definition: To clean between teeth with dental floss.
meanings.sent1: I need to flossie my teeth before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: She flossies her teeth diligently every night.
meanings.sent3: He flossied his teeth so vigorously, he accidentally broke the floss.
meanings.sent4: Flossie carefully to keep your gums healthy.
meanings.sent5: Remember to flossie gently to avoid hurting your gums.

meanings.definition: A fluffy or frilly decoration, typically used in sewing or crafting.
meanings.sent1: She added a cute flossie to the dress she was sewing.
meanings.sent2: The pillow was adorned with a lovely flossie trim.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the flossie, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: The flossie on the curtains gave the room a charming touch.
meanings.sent5: The flossie on the hat made it look elegant and stylish.
